artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Daikokuya Kichinosuke; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 82; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 190–191 no. 295, p. 304.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: separated triptych; three figures standing a downpour against gray background, each clutching large umbrella; female figure at L looking back over PL shoulder; male figure standing at C looking behind him to R; male figure at R facing L, holding umbrella; shadows of blossoming plants in background
dimension: 14 × 9 7/8 in. (35.56 × 25.08 cm) (image, sheet, each sheet; vertical ōban triptych)
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳桐 {Yoshikiri} | Carver’s seal: 深彫長 {Fuka hori Chō} | Censor seal: 戌四改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
text: Actors Ichimura Uzaemon XIII (R), Sawamura Tanosuke III (C), and Kawarazaki Gonjūrō I (L).
title: Evening Shower among Flowers
